title: Newly Remodeled Large 1 BR/1BA--Water, Garbage, Garage!
posting_body: ['Peninsula View Apartments', '572 King Drive', 'Daly City, CA  94015', 'Located on the South San Francisco Borderline', 'Balcony Deck!', ' Bright Units with Views & Enclosed Garage', '**WALK THROUGH ON-SITE TOURS AVAILABLE**', 'Large 1 Bedroom Apartment starting at $2,595/mo.', 'and up, includes water & garbage, enclosed garage, additional walk-in storage unit.', 'Depending upon the unit, they have hardwood floors throughout.', ' Some units have carpet in the living room and bedroom with hardwood-like flooring in entry, kitchen and dining room', 'Most with granite countertops, and crown moulding throughout', 'Stainless steel or white appliances,', 'Walk in closet.', 'Appliances include Refrigerator with ice-maker, Range and Dishwasher, most with Microwave', 'Newly Remodeled Units start at $2,695/mo.', 'have all new engineered hardwood floors throughout,', '~quartz', 'or granite countertops,', '~crown moulding throughout,', '~stainless steel appliances include refrigerator with ice maker, dishwasher, self-cleaning range and microwave,', '~new fixtures and', '~beautifully painted with custom colors', '~Remodeled All tile Bathroom with shower doors and vanity,', '~Top floor units have lovely vaulted ceilings.', '-', '- Water & Garbage Included!', '- Enclosed Garage, most with Automatic Garage Door Opener,', '- Additional Walk in Storage Room,', '- Large Balcony Deck some with Very Nice Views,', '- Large dining area and living room,', '- Our one bedrooms can accommodate king size beds,', '- Laundry Room in Building,', 'To View A Complete Virtual Tour of one of our 1 Bedroom Apartments at Peninsula View Apartments, please visit:', '<URL>', 'PLEASE NOTE: ***  Images & descriptions shown are for example only and do not necessarily represent all units.', 'If you have a question about the units/amenities/pricing available, please call or e-mail for more info.', ' ***', '- Sorry, No Pets!', '- Low Move in Costs with Good Rental References & Good Credit,', '- Non-Smoking Building,', "- Renter's Insurance Required,", '- 12 Month Minimum Stay Required.', 'For more information and/or set up an appointment to see one of our apartments, Call', 'show contact info', 'first,', 'Secondary, number please call', 'show contact info']
